definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to lie down all over the place/exhausted and in disarray

sentences.english: The path led straight through a wide stream.
sentences.chinese: 小道的前面橫躺着一條小河，河面很寬。

sentences.english: He was sprawled full-length across the bed.
sentences.chinese: 他手腳攤開橫躺在牀上。

sentences.english: And we saw this big flat boulder underneath a bridge and so we said, 'OK.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們看到一座橋下橫躺着一塊大石頭。

sentences.english: Here friend by friend in bloody channel lies.
sentences.chinese: 朋友偎靠着朋友，都在血泊中橫躺。

sentences.english: The cumbersome eighteen-wheeled vehicle was spread across the road, blocking all traffic movement.
sentences.chinese: 這臺笨重的十八輪車輛橫躺在路上，把交通全堵死了。

sentences.english: They came to a large tree lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 她倆走着走着，遇到一棵大樹，橫躺在地上。

sentences.english: A man lay sprawled across three entire seats in the posh theatre.
sentences.chinese: 一個豪華影院裏，一名男子橫躺在整整三個座位上。
